title: How to Make Crème Fraîche (in One Easy Step!)
full_text:
How to Make Crème Fraîche (in One Easy Step!)
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
1 min
Resting Time
12 hrs
Total
12 hrs 5 mins
Serves
16 servings
Makes
2 cups
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1
pint
(
16
ounces
)
heavy cream
2
tablespoons
(
1
ounce
)
cultured buttermilk (or yogurt)
Directions
Combine buttermilk and heavy cream in a non-reactive container. Cover and allow to rest at room temperature until thickened to desired texture, about 12 hours. Store in the refrigerator for up to 2 weeks.
